GK19amaru_u:2: This edition is based on the one in Kāvya-saṅgraha edited by Jīvānanda
GK19amaru_u:3: Vidyāsāgara. It has been compared with the Motilal Banarsidass edition (1983)
GK19amaru_u:4: containing the commentary of Arjunavarmadeva. The number in parentheses at the
GK19amaru_u:5: end of the last line of each verse is the number of the verse in the Motilal
GK19amaru_u:6: edition. There seems to be a great deal of variation in the order and numbering
GK19amaru_u:7: of the verses between the editions and the commentators. The order of the verses
GK19amaru_u:8: found in the Kāvya-saṅgraha forms the backbone of the order of the verses
GK19amaru_u:10: even though Arjunavarmadeva considers some of the verses found
GK19amaru_u:11: in that edition to be interpolations. Those suspect verses have been noted in
GK19amaru_u:13: The parentheses in between verses contain citations for the major
GK19amaru_u:14: anthologies. These have been taken from Sures Chandra Banerji's
GK19amaru_u:15: edition of Śrīdharadāsa's Sadukti-karṇāmṛta. The abbreviations for those
GK19amaru_u:23: (These equivalences have been taken from the Banerji edition of Sad-ukti-karṇāmṛta and the De edition of Padyāvalī.)
GK19amaru_u:33: kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ //2// (2)
GK19amaru_u:43: kathaya sukṛtī ko'yaṃ mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate //4// (4)
GK19amaru_u:45: datto'syāḥ praṇayastvayaiva bhavatā ceyaṃ ciraṃ lālitā
GK19amaru_u:46: daivād adya kila tvameva kṛtavān asyā navaṃ vipriyam /
GK19amaru_u:47: manyurduḥsaha eṣa yātyupaśamaṃ no sāntvavādaiḥ sphuṭaṃ
GK19amaru_u:55: nāryastanvi haṭhāddharanti ramaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti no vāritās
GK19amaru_u:56: tatkiṃ tāmyasi kiṃ ca rodiṣi mudhā tāsāṃ priyaṃ mā kṛthāḥ /
GK19amaru_u:60: nāryo mugdhaśaṭhā haranti ramaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti no vāritās ...
GK19amaru_u:63: nītvā keliniketanaṃ dayitayā sāyaṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:65: dhanyo hanyata eva nihnutiparaḥ preyān rudatyā hasan //8// (9)
GK19amaru_u:75: yātāḥ kiṃ na milanti sundari punaścintā tvayā matkṛte
GK19amaru_u:76: no kāryā nitarāṃ kṛśāmi kathayatyevaṃ sabāṣpe mayi /
GK19amaru_u:79: dhīraṃ vāridharasya vāri kirataḥ śrutvā niśīthe dhvaniṃ
GK19amaru_u:85: kaṭhinahṛdayastyaktvā śayyāṃ balād gata eva saḥ /
GK19amaru_u:87: punarapi hatavrīḍaṃ cetaḥ prayāti karomi kim //12//(15)
GK19amaru_u:96: ajñānena parāṅmukhīṃ paribhavād āśliṣya māṃ duḥkhitāṃ
GK19amaru_u:97: kiṃ labdhaṃ caṭula tvayeha nayatā saubhāgyametāṃ daśām /
GK19amaru_u:117: mugdhākṣī svaiptīti tatparijanaṃ svairaṃ priye pṛcchati /
GK19amaru_u:127: paśyāmo mayi kiṃ prapadyata iti sthairyaṃ mayālambitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:130: savyājaṃ hasitaṃ mayā dhṛtiharo bāṣpastu muktastayā //20//(24)
GK19amaru_u:139: ityukte kva tad ityudīrya sahasā tatsampramārṣṭuṃ mayā
GK19amaru_u:141: tvaṃ mugdhākṣi vinaiva kañculikayā dhatse manohāriṇīṃ
GK19amaru_u:148: dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñjane //24//(28)
GK19amaru_u:151: kānte katyapi vāsarāṇi gamaya tvaṃ mīlayitvā dṛśau
GK19amaru_u:152: svasti svasti nimīlayāmi nayane yāvan na śūnyā diśaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:163: tanurapi na te doṣo'smākaṃ vidhistu parāṅmukhaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:164: tava yathā tathābhūtaṃ prema prapannamimāṃ daśāṃ
GK19amaru_u:165: prakṛticapale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hatajīvite //27// (30)
GK19amaru_u:167: urasi nihitastāro hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane
GK19amaru_u:173: kiṃ mugdhe na mayā kṛtaṃ ramaṇadhīrmuktā tvayā gamyatāṃ
GK19amaru_u:174: dusthaṃ tiṣṭhasi yacca pathyamadhunā kartāsmi tacchroṣyasi //29//(33)
GK19amaru_u:175: sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ
GK19amaru_u:177: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ
GK19amaru_u:183: dhṛtyā na kṣaṇamāsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:184: gantuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā
GK19amaru_u:192: prāptaṃ tairamṛtaṃ mudhaiva mathito mūḍhaiḥ suraiḥ sāgaraḥ //32//(36)
GK19amaru_u:195: premāvāsitayā mayā saralayā nyastaṃ mukhaṃ tanmukhe /
GK19amaru_u:197: lajjāsīn mama tena sāpyapahṛtā tatkālayogyaiḥ kramaiḥ //33//(37)
GK19amaru_u:198: kopo yatra bhrūkuṭiracanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ
GK19amaru_u:200: tasya premṇastad idamadhunā vaiṣamaṃ paśya jātaṃ
GK19amaru_u:201: tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi nahi me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ //34//(38)
GK19amaru_u:203: sutanu jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ
GK19amaru_u:204: na khalu tava kadācitkopa evaṃ vidho'bhūt /
GK19amaru_u:210: mā mā mānada māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī
GK19amaru_u:211: suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim //36//(40)
GK19amaru_u:220: nivṛtte sadbhāve jana iva jane gacchati puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:222: na jāne ko heturdalati śatadhā yan na hṛdayam //38//(43)
GK19amaru_u:232: prasarati kathā bahvī yūnoryathā na tathā ratiḥ //39//(44)
GK19amaru_u:234: puṣpāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitena racito no kundajātyādibhiḥ /
GK19amaru_u:235: dattaḥ svedamucā payodharayuge nārghyo na kumbhāmbhasā
GK19amaru_u:246: tāvantyeva kṛtāgaso drutataraṃ vyāhṛtya patyuḥ puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:247: prārabdhā purato yathā manasijasyājñā tathā vartituṃ
GK19amaru_u:248: premṇo maugdhyavibhūṣaṇasya sahajaḥ ko'pyeṣa kāntaḥ kramaḥ //43//(48)
GK19amaru_u:259: sphuṭo rekhānyāsaḥ kathamapi sa tādṛk pariṇato
GK19amaru_u:260: gatā yena vyaktaṃ punaravayavaiḥ saiva taruṇī // 46//
GK19amaru_u:266: ruṣā brahmāstraṃ me śarasi nihito vāmacaraṇaḥ //
GK19amaru_u:270: kimidamathavā satyaṃ mugdhe tvayā hi viniścitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:271: yad abhirucitaṃ tan me kṛtvā priye sukhamāsyatām //47//(53)
GK19amaru_u:281: nūnaṃ bibheda yad asau prasasāda sadyaḥ // 49//
GK19amaru_u:305: bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣān mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
GK19amaru_u:306: khedo'smāsu na me'parādhyati bhavān sarve'parādhā mayi /
GK19amaru_u:307: tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate
GK19amaru_u:308: nanvetan mama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmītyato rudyate //53//(57)
GK19amaru_u:313: pītvā śītkārivaktraṃ śiśuharidṛśāṃ haimanā vānti vātāḥ // 54//
GK19amaru_u:316: śrutvā tanvyā niśīthe navaghanarasitaṃ viślathāṅkaṃ patitvā
GK19amaru_u:319: smṛtvā smṛtvā priyasya skhalitamṛduvaco rudyate pānthabadhvā // 55//
GK19amaru_u:322: śliṣṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kimiti na mayā mūḍhayā prāṇanāthaś
GK19amaru_u:323: cumbatyasmin vadanavidhutiḥ kiṃ kṛtā kiṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:325: paścāttāpaṃ vahati taruṇī premṇi jāte rasajñā //56//(58)
GK19amaru_u:327: śrutvā nāmāpi yasya sphuṭaghanapulakaṃ jāyate'ṅgaṃ samantāt
GK19amaru_u:330: bhagnā mānasya cintā bhavati mama pnarvajramayyāḥ kadā nu //57//(59)
GK19amaru_u:352: puṇyāhaṃ vraja maṅgalaṃ sudivasaṃ prātaḥ prayātasya te
GK19amaru_u:358: no vā pādatale tayā nipatitaṃ tiṣṭheti noktaṃ vacaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:364: na jāne saṃmukhāyāte priyāṇi vadati priye /
GK19amaru_u:365: sarvāṇyaṅgāni me yānti śrotratāṃ kimu netratām //63//(64)
GK19amaru_u:372: pādāsakte suciramiha te vāmatā kaiva kānte
GK19amaru_u:375: bāṣpodbhedaistad anu sahasā na sthitaṃ na prayātam //65//(68)
GK19amaru_u:377: tato nu tvaṃ preyānvayamapi hatāśāḥ priyatamāḥ /
GK19amaru_u:381: mānaṃ dhatsva dhṛtiṃ vadhāna ṛjutāṃ dūre kuru preyasi /
GK19amaru_u:383: nīceḥ śaṃsa hṛdi sthito nanu sa me prāṇeśvaraḥ śroṣyati //67//(70)
GK19amaru_u:391: prāṇādhiko vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me /
GK19amaru_u:392: ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle
GK19amaru_u:397: mugdhā kudmalitānanena dadhato vāyuṃ sthitā tasya sā
GK19amaru_u:398: bhrāntyā dhūrtatayā ca vepathumatī tenāniśaṃ cumbitā //70//(72)
GK19amaru_u:399: sphuṭatu hṛdayaṃ kāmaṃ kāmaṃ karatu tanuṃ tanuṃ
GK19amaru_u:400: na sakhi caṭulapremṇā kāryaṃ punardayitena me /
GK19amaru_u:405: śayyā samprati komalāṅgi paruṣetyāropya māṃ vakṣasi /
GK19amaru_u:414: dattaikaṃ saśucā gṛhaṃ prati padaṃ pānthastriyāsminkṣaṇe
GK19amaru_u:419: tanvaṅgyā ratikātareṇa manasā nītaḥ pradīpaḥ śamam //75//(77)
GK19amaru_u:426: tacchūnye punarāsthitāsmi bhavane prāṇāsta ete dṛḍhāḥ
GK19amaru_u:431: lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //78//(82)
GK19amaru_u:436: jātā notkalikā stanau na lulitau gātraṃ na romāñcitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:438: dṛṣṭenāva mano hṛtaṃ dhṛtimuṣā prāṇeśvareṇādya me
GK19amaru_u:442: ityākṣipya yadā samastamaghṛṇo gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ śaṭhaḥ
GK19amaru_u:446: na dṛṣṭeḥ śaithilyaṃ milana iti ceto dahati me
GK19amaru_u:454: ghana ghaṭayituṃ nisnehaṃ tvāṃ ya eva nivartane
GK19amaru_u:455: prabhavati gavāṃ kinnaśchinnaṃ sa eva dhanañjayaḥ //84//(32)
GK19amaru_u:457: gacchantī kva nu gacchasīti vidhṛtā bālā paṭānte mayā /
GK19amaru_u:458: pratyāvṛttamukhī sabāṣpanayanā māṃ muñca muñceti sā
GK19amaru_u:469: priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam //87// (81)
GK19amaru_u:487: tanvaṅgyā gurusannidhau nayanajaṃ yad vāri saṃstambhitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:493: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:500: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:501: baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daive sthitā //
GK19amaru_u:505: yatnenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi /
GK19amaru_u:509: mlānaṃ pāṇḍu kṛśaṃ viyogavidhuraṃ lambālakaṃ sālasaṃ
GK19amaru_u:512: yatpītaṃ sutanormayā vadanakaṃ vaktuṃ na tatpāryate //94//(88)
GK19amaru_u:513: saivāhaṃ pramadā nṛṇāmadhigatāvetau ca tau nūpurāv
GK19amaru_u:515: itthaṃ lajjitayā smṛterupagame matvā tanuṃ sambhramāt
GK19amaru_u:521: santyevātra gṛhe gṛhe yuvatayastāḥ pṛccha gatvādhunā
GK19amaru_u:522: preyāṃsaḥ praṇamanti kiṃ tava punardāso yathā vartate /
GK19amaru_u:523: ātmadrohiṇi durjanaiḥ pralapitaṃ karṇe'niśaṃ mā kṛthāś
GK19amaru_u:526: nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate /
GK19amaru_u:528: sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇamākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ //98// (92)
GK19amaru_u:530: adyārabhya yadi priye punarahaṃ mānasya vā'nyasya vā
GK19amaru_u:533: eko vā divasaḥ payodamalino yāyānmama prāvṛṣi //99//(93)
GK19amaru_u:534: idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama tanu śvetamatha kiṃ
GK19amaru_u:537: sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ //100//(94)
GK19amaru_u:540: iti hi capalo mānārambhastathāpi hi notsahe
GK19amaru_u:545: gṛhītā dharmille sakhi sa ca mayā gāḍhamadhare //102//(98)
GK19amaru_u:547: rāge yāte'tibhūmiṃ vikasati sutarāṃ gocare dūtikāyāḥ /
GK19amaru_u:550: kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanād
GK19amaru_u:553: ko'yaṃ kāsmi rataṃ nu vā kathamiti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ //104//(101)
GK19amaru_u:554: prāsāde sā diśi diśi ca sā pṛṣṭhataḥ sā puraḥ sā
GK19amaru_u:555: paryaṅke sā pathi pathi ca sā tadviyogāturasya /
GK19amaru_u:556: haṃho cetaḥ prakṛtiraparā nāsti me kāpi sā sā
GK19amaru_u:557: sā sā sā sā jagati sakale ko'yamadvaitavādaḥ //105//(102)
GK19amaru_u:559: tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:563: Verses found in Arjunavarmadeva's version not found here
GK19amaru_u:565: tūṣṇīṃ rodiṣi kopane bahutaraṃ phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi /
GK19amaru_u:568: tadvaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā pādayos
GK19amaru_u:570: pāṇibhyāṃ ca tiraskṛtaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ
GK19amaru_u:571: sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti śatadhā yatkañcuke sandhayaḥ //(11)
GK19amaru_u:573: yo dīrghaṃ divasaṃ viṣahya viṣamaṃ yatnātkathaṃciddhṛtaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:579: mānasyāpi jalāñjaliḥ sarabhasaṃ lokena datto yathā //(54)
GK19amaru_u:585: tatrāpyarpayituṃ dṛśaṃ suracitāṃ śaknomi na vrīḍayā /
GK19amaru_u:587: mātaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇo'nurāgānalaḥ //(63)
GK19amaru_u:589: svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari //(65)
GK19amaru_u:591: na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yadvadhūḥ kiyanna tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam //(66)
GK19amaru_u:598: This edition is based on the one in Kāvya-saṅgraha edited
GK19amaru_u:599: by Jīvānanda Vidyāsāgara. īt has been compared with the
GK19amaru_u:602: Arjunavarmadeva. The number in parentheses at the end of the last
GK19amaru_u:603: line of each verse is the number of the verse in the Motilal edition.
GK19amaru_u:604: There seems to be a great deal of variation in the order and numbering
GK19amaru_u:605: of the verses between the editions and the commentators. The order of
GK19amaru_u:606: the verses found in the Kāvya-saṅgraha forms the backbone
GK19amaru_u:607: of the order of the verses presented here,
GK19amaru_u:609: considers some of the verses found in that edition to be
GK19amaru_u:610: interpolations. Those suspect verses have been noted in the footnotes.

GK19amaru_u:762: prakṛticapale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hatajīvite //27//(30)
GK19amaru_u:764: urasi nihitastāro hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane
GK19amaru_u:770: kiṃ mugdhe na mayā kṛtaṃ ramaṇadhīrmuktā tvayā gamyatāṃ
GK19amaru_u:771: dusthaṃ tiṣṭhasi yacca pathyamadhunā kartāsmi tacchroṣyasi //29//(33)
GK19amaru_u:772: sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ
GK19amaru_u:774: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ
GK19amaru_u:780: dhṛtyā na kṣaṇamāsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:781: gantuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā
GK19amaru_u:789: prāptaṃ tairamṛtaṃ mudhaiva mathito mūḍhaiḥ suraiḥ sāgaraḥ //32//(36)
GK19amaru_u:792: premāvāsitayā mayā saralayā nyastaṃ mukhaṃ tanmukhe /
GK19amaru_u:794: lajjāsīn mama tena sāpyapahṛtā tatkālayogyaiḥ kramaiḥ //33//(37)
GK19amaru_u:795: kopo yatra bhrūkuṭiracanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ
GK19amaru_u:797: tasya premṇastad idamadhunā vaiṣamaṃ paśya jātaṃ
GK19amaru_u:798: tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi nahi me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ //34//(38)
GK19amaru_u:800: sutanu jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ
GK19amaru_u:801: na khalu tava kadācitkopa evaṃ vidho'bhūt /
GK19amaru_u:807: mā mā mānada māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī
GK19amaru_u:808: suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim //36//(40)
GK19amaru_u:817: nivṛtte sadbhāve jana iva jane gacchati puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:819: na jāne ko heturdalati śatadhā yan na hṛdayam //38//(43)
GK19amaru_u:829: prasarati kathā bahvī yūnoryathā na tathā ratiḥ //39//(44)
GK19amaru_u:831: puṣpāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitena racito no kundajātyādibhiḥ /
GK19amaru_u:832: dattaḥ svedamucā payodharayuge nārghyo na kumbhāmbhasā
GK19amaru_u:844: tāvantyeva kṛtāgaso drutataraṃ vyāhṛtya patyuḥ puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:845: prārabdhā purato yathā manasijasyājñā tathā vartituṃ
GK19amaru_u:846: premṇo maugdhyavibhūṣaṇasya sahajaḥ ko'pyeṣa kāntaḥ kramaḥ //43//(48)
GK19amaru_u:857: sphuṭo rekhānyāsaḥ kathamapi sa tādṛk pariṇato
GK19amaru_u:858: gatā yena vyaktaṃ punaravayavaiḥ saiva taruṇī //46//(51)
GK19amaru_u:863: ruṣā brahmāstraṃ me śarasi nihito vāmacaraṇaḥ //
GK19amaru_u:867: kimidamathavā satyaṃ mugdhe tvayā hi viniścitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:868: yad abhirucitaṃ tan me kṛtvā priye sukhamāsyatām //47//(53)
GK19amaru_u:877: nūnaṃ bibheda yad asau prasasāda sadyaḥ //49//
GK19amaru_u:897: bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣān mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
GK19amaru_u:898: khedo'smāsu na me'parādhyati bhavān sarve'parādhā mayi /
GK19amaru_u:899: tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate
GK19amaru_u:900: nanvetan mama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmītyato rudyate //53//(57)
GK19amaru_u:905: pītvā śītkārivaktraṃ śiśuharidṛśāṃ haimanā vānti vātāḥ//54//
GK19amaru_u:907: śrutvā tanvyā niśīthe navaghanarasitaṃ viślathāṅkaṃ patitvā
GK19amaru_u:910: smṛtvā smṛtvā priyasya skhalitamṛduvaco rudyate pānthabadhvā //55//
GK19amaru_u:912: śliṣṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kimiti na mayā mūḍhayā prāṇanāthaś
GK19amaru_u:913: cumbatyasmin vadanavidhutiḥ kiṃ kṛtā kiṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:915: paścāttāpaṃ vahati taruṇī premṇi jāte rasajñā //56//(58)
GK19amaru_u:917: śrutvā nāmāpi yasya sphuṭaghanapulakaṃ jāyate'ṅgaṃ samantāt
GK19amaru_u:920: bhagnā mānasya cintā bhavati mama pnarvajramayyāḥ kadā nu //57//(59)
GK19amaru_u:939: puṇyāhaṃ vraja maṅgalaṃ sudivasaṃ prātaḥ prayātasya te
GK19amaru_u:945: no vā pādatale tayā nipatitaṃ tiṣṭheti noktaṃ vacaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:951: na jāne saṃmukhāyāte priyāṇi vadati priye /
GK19amaru_u:952: sarvāṇyaṅgāni me yānti śrotratāṃ kimu netratām //63//(64)
GK19amaru_u:959: pādāsakte suciramiha te vāmatā kaiva kānte
GK19amaru_u:962: bāṣpodbhedaistad anu sahasā na sthitaṃ na prayātam //65//(68)
GK19amaru_u:964: tato nu tvaṃ preyānvayamapi hatāśāḥ priyatamāḥ /
GK19amaru_u:968: mānaṃ dhatsva dhṛtiṃ vadhāna ṛjutāṃ dūre kuru preyasi /
GK19amaru_u:970: nīceḥ śaṃsa hṛdi sthito nanu sa me prāṇeśvaraḥ śroṣyati //67//(70)
GK19amaru_u:977: prāṇādhiko vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me /
GK19amaru_u:978: ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle
GK19amaru_u:983: mugdhā kudmalitānanena dadhato vāyuṃ sthitā tasya sā
GK19amaru_u:984: bhrāntyā dhūrtatayā ca vepathumatī tenāniśaṃ cumbitā //70//(72)
GK19amaru_u:985: sphuṭatu hṛdayaṃ kāmaṃ kāmaṃ karatu tanuṃ tanuṃ
GK19amaru_u:986: na sakhi caṭulapremṇā kāryaṃ punardayitena me /
GK19amaru_u:991: śayyā samprati komalāṅgi paruṣetyāropya māṃ vakṣasi /
GK19amaru_u:1000: dattaikaṃ saśucā gṛhaṃ prati padaṃ pānthastriyāsminkṣaṇe
GK19amaru_u:1005: tanvaṅgyā ratikātareṇa manasā nītaḥ pradīpaḥ śamam //75//(77)
GK19amaru_u:1012: tacchūnye punarāsthitāsmi bhavane prāṇāsta ete dṛḍhāḥ
GK19amaru_u:1017: lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //78//(82)
GK19amaru_u:1022: jātā notkalikā stanau na lulitau gātraṃ na romāñcitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:1024: dṛṣṭenāva mano hṛtaṃ dhṛtimuṣā prāṇeśvareṇādya me
GK19amaru_u:1028: ityākṣipya yadā samastamaghṛṇo gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ śaṭhaḥ
GK19amaru_u:1033: na dṛṣṭeḥ śaithilyaṃ milana iti ceto dahati me
GK19amaru_u:1041: ghana ghaṭayituṃ nisnehaṃ tvāṃ ya eva nivartane
GK19amaru_u:1042: prabhavati gavāṃ kinnaśchinnaṃ sa eva dhanañjayaḥ //84//(32)
GK19amaru_u:1044: gacchantī kva nu gacchasīti vidhṛtā bālā paṭānte mayā /
GK19amaru_u:1045: pratyāvṛttamukhī sabāṣpanayanā māṃ muñca muñceti sā
GK19amaru_u:1055: priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam //87//(81)
GK19amaru_u:1073: tanvaṅgyā gurusannidhau nayanajaṃ yad vāri saṃstambhitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:1079: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:1085: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:1086: baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daive sthitā //
GK19amaru_u:1090: yatnenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi /
GK19amaru_u:1094: mlānaṃ pāṇḍu kṛśaṃ viyogavidhuraṃ lambālakaṃ sālasaṃ
GK19amaru_u:1097: yatpītaṃ sutanormayā vadanakaṃ vaktuṃ na tatpāryate //94//(88)
GK19amaru_u:1098: saivāhaṃ pramadā nṛṇāmadhigatāvetau ca tau nūpurāv
GK19amaru_u:1100: itthaṃ lajjitayā smṛterupagame matvā tanuṃ sambhramāt
GK19amaru_u:1106: santyevātra gṛhe gṛhe yuvatayastāḥ pṛccha gatvādhunā
GK19amaru_u:1107: preyāṃsaḥ praṇamanti kiṃ tava punardāso yathā vartate /
GK19amaru_u:1108: ātmadrohiṇi durjanaiḥ pralapitaṃ karṇe'niśaṃ mā kṛthāś
GK19amaru_u:1111: nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate /
GK19amaru_u:1113: sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇamākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ //98//(92)
GK19amaru_u:1115: adyārabhya yadi priye punarahaṃ mānasya vā'nyasya vā
GK19amaru_u:1118: eko vā divasaḥ payodamalino yāyānmama prāvṛṣi //99//(93)
GK19amaru_u:1119: idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama tanu śvetamatha kiṃ
GK19amaru_u:1122: sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ //100//(94)
GK19amaru_u:1125: iti hi capalo mānārambhastathāpi hi notsahe
GK19amaru_u:1130: gṛhītā dharmille sakhi sa ca mayā gāḍhamadhare //102//(98)
GK19amaru_u:1132: rāge yāte'tibhūmiṃ vikasati sutarāṃ gocare dūtikāyāḥ /
GK19amaru_u:1135: kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanād
GK19amaru_u:1138: ko'yaṃ kāsmi rataṃ nu vā kathamiti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ //104//(101)
GK19amaru_u:1139: prāsāde sā diśi diśi ca sā pṛṣṭhataḥ sā puraḥ sā
GK19amaru_u:1140: paryaṅke sā pathi pathi ca sā tadviyogāturasya /
GK19amaru_u:1141: haṃho cetaḥ prakṛtiraparā nāsti me kāpi sā sā
GK19amaru_u:1142: sā sā sā sā jagati sakale ko'yamadvaitavādaḥ //105//(102) ***
GK19amaru_u:1144: Verses found in Arjunavarmadeva's version not found here
GK19amaru_u:1146: tūṣṇīṃ rodiṣi kopane bahutaraṃ phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi /
GK19amaru_u:1149: tadvaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā pādayos
GK19amaru_u:1151: pāṇibhyāṃ ca tiraskṛtaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ
GK19amaru_u:1152: sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti śatadhā yatkañcuke sandhayaḥ //(11)
GK19amaru_u:1154: yo dīrghaṃ divasaṃ viṣahya viṣamaṃ yatnātkathaṃciddhṛtaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:1160: mānasyāpi jalāñjaliḥ sarabhasaṃ lokena datto yathā //(54)
GK19amaru_u:1166: tatrāpyarpayituṃ dṛśaṃ suracitāṃ śaknomi na vrīḍayā /
GK19amaru_u:1168: mātaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇo'nurāgānalaḥ //(63)
GK19amaru_u:1170: svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari //(65)
GK19amaru_u:1172: na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yadvadhūḥ kiyanna tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam //(66)
GK19amaru_u:1174: tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ /
